website_summaries.verdict: While its automated release is a big plus, uneven heating can make sublimation pressing difficult.
pros: No smelly “burn-off” required for new units
Press automatically releases once timer cycle completes, freeing up users to do other things
cons: Clamshell can be difficult to open at higher pressure settings
Somewhat heavy and not very portable
A few reported issues with press not heating correctly

customer_reviews.title: Very Happy with the Heat Press.
customer_reviews.text: Came out of the box and I set it right up. Instructions were included. I didn't have to go online to find the instructions. Works great. I've used it several times and I'm very satisfied with the product. I'm not a commercial user, so my use has been very limited. But its a great product and I'm glad that I purchased this one.
customer_reviews.author: Jeree P.

customer_reviews.title: My first press....
customer_reviews.text: This is my first press, and I fretted over what to get. In the end I chose this one because of its price point and reviews. It is basic--but it required no assembly and was literally plug it in and use it. I'm finding that I'd like my next one to have the swing away platen, but that's way down the road since I only use this for my personal projects.
customer_reviews.author: Amy Champagne

customer_reviews.title: LOVE THIS.
customer_reviews.text: LOVE THIS... makes applying vinyl to shirts a breeze. I have also used it to iron jeans when it was on and I was super lazy... Hey it works better than my iron!!!
customer_reviews.author: Aimee

customer_reviews.title: AWESOME!! I can’t tell you enough how much ...
customer_reviews.text: AWESOME!! I can’t tell you enough how much easier it is to make Tees with a heat press vs an iron! I am sooo impressed by how well this heat press works. I had read several of the reviews & was a little nervous. But I’m telling you my experience is great! Easy to put together & easy to use! It took me about 10 min to get the hang of it. I also really like that there’s a timer & it automatically stops when you open the press!
customer_reviews.author: shoppingcrazemama

customer_reviews.title: Heat & pressure unpredictable.  Too much trouble to correct issues.
customer_reviews.text: Unpredictability of heat & pressure. Not a good purchase. Customer service? What customer service.
customer_reviews.author: Aileen

customer_reviews.title: Worked well for us right out of the box
customer_reviews.text: We used this press to immediately construct 36 custom T-shirts, each requiring 4 separate presses, on the day we received it. We'd already owned a 10" x 12" press by the same manufacturer which continues to serve us well, so we decided to buy the same brand. We didn't expect a $1000 press for this price, but for our purposes it's great. Now where to store it? It's pretty big.
customer_reviews.author: T. Wygant

customer_reviews.title: Great quality for a great price
customer_reviews.text: I did a lot of research and read a lot of reviews before I bought my heat press. I'm also in a ton of cricut facebook groups so I did some researching there also. I found that maybe 9 out of every 10 have purchased this same press. I have used it several times and I couldn't be any happier with my decision. For $6 for 3 years how could you pass up on an extended warranty. I highly recommend this heat press!
customer_reviews.author: Kelly Ann Watson

customer_reviews.title: Very happy with it!
customer_reviews.text: I read many reviews and researched many heat presses. I am thoroughly impressed with this press. It does an excellent job. It can be difficult to press down and lock/lift up BUT you’re getting what you pay for and for this price, it is excellent. No inconsistencies. Came perfect in the mail and ready to use. You don’t need instructions. Plug in, turn one set your timer and heat setting. Let warm up. Adjust pressure as needed and that’s it. The top gets super hot but I believe that to be the case with most commercial grade presses.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Heats up quickly, there was a strong smell when ...
customer_reviews.text: Heats up quickly, there was a strong smell when opening but not much of one when turned on. My main complaint is that I seem to be having some trouble unlocking and opening it, which is dangerous when youve got 300+ degrees on fabric. When I try to open it the entire press lifts off the table slightly before it finally unlocks and opens.
customer_reviews.author: Courtney

customer_reviews.title: Poor quality assembly
customer_reviews.text: Evendo came well packed I found 3 screws in the bag, 2 of those I was able to put it back. The third one the hole was too big. I turn on the machine and use it for half hour, works fine at the moment.
customer_reviews.author: EL Boli

customer_reviews.title: Stopped working after 30 minutes.
customer_reviews.text: I received the heat press, used it to press the front of the shirt, laid the letters on the back of the shirt, then it machine started beeping very loudly and showing an HHH flashing on the temperature panel. I searched online to find out why, they suggested opening the back and tightening a cord, which was not lose as it was molded or weld to machine. So..... machine stopped working after 30 minutes... sent back the next day. I do plan to reorder WHENEVER THEY ISSUE MY REFUND.... because I've heard mostly good things about the heat press. I'm hoping I just got a bad one that time and the next one will actually work.
customer_reviews.author: Neddy

customer_reviews.title: Broke after second use- one month old - can’t return.
customer_reviews.text: Just bought this but unfortunately didn’t need until this weekend. When I tested for the second time (first time was upon receiving it and had no issues) it was broken. The time and temp will not move. The machine is pretty much useless to me and I have never used it. If there’s any way to return can someone contact me no one answered our calls or chats
customer_reviews.author: Vicki

customer_reviews.title: Good so far
customer_reviews.text: I've used this press twice and it has worked great. The only thing I would say is playing with getting the temp where you want it is tricky. You have to watch, can't walk away from it. Other than that so far so good.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Uneven heat plate.
customer_reviews.text: Been using for 2 months. I’ve tried to adjust everything possible to make for even pressure. There are two corners that have gap when clamped which means plate isn’t pressing firmly. It’s difficult to raise because pressure must be firm to over compensate for uneven pressure. I want to return. Can’t find way to return. I would not recommend product, I’ve ruined several shirts trying to figure out this press. For record, I’ve been in shirt business for 7 years. My other heat press stopped working. I thought this would be a good product, very wrong. Want to return!!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Died after a year, 13 months to be exact
customer_reviews.text: I have had this machine for 14 months and it died. Just used it a few days ago, went to use it last night it blew a fuse and won’t come back on. Instead of buying another one that will probably die in another year, I’ll just spend the extra $200-300 and buy a quality press I’d say it’s an okay investment for a backup press but if you are looking to do business full time or make a decent side hustle, go with something better.
customer_reviews.author: La Shonda Edwards

customer_reviews.title: Great Value great product
customer_reviews.text: This is my first heat press. I’ve been using it for about 2 weeks now and it’s been very consistent with the results when making T-shirt’s. I’ve used it for HYV vinyl and also Transfer paper and the results have been amazing. Even heat distribution and the plate itself heats up pretty quickly. Great value for the money. Worth every penny!
customer_reviews.author: Mel

customer_reviews.title: Time and temperature controls didn't initially work
customer_reviews.text: Upon receiving the heat press I wasn't able to change the settings of the time and temperature! I was preparing myself to return the machine but My boyfriend decided to open the back of the machine and found that everything was loose (not sure if this was caused doing shipment) but with a few adjustments the machine is now working perfectly
customer_reviews.author: HowToWithMone/PinkModeInc

customer_reviews.title: Great customer service!
customer_reviews.text: Only used a few tims but so far no issues other than the Teflon sheet that came with it ripped after 2 uses because of a crease that was in the sheet. I contacted the company and they sent me 2 new teflon sheets to replace it! Great customer service! So far im satisfied!!
customer_reviews.author: April

customer_reviews.title: It just arrived and I LOVE IT.  My shirts look so much more professional
customer_reviews.text: It takes 10 seconds to do what the iron took 30minutes to do. And it looks amazing. Simply print and press. I have my cricut coming next week but this came first and it really will boost my business look and sales. So much more professional. Hope it lasts for a long time. It was easy to use. Easy to line up shirts and the heat press gives it an even and beautiful transfer. Very happy. shipped quickly and was in one piece.
customer_reviews.author: Joshua hemming

customer_reviews.title: Great Value and Good Heating; some safety concern
customer_reviews.text: I’ve been using this press for over a year. I am completely satisfied with the heating performance and value. There are two issues with the product design: 1) it’s difficult to open, especially troublesome safety issue when hot, 2) it slides easily on my table; again, little unsafe when hot—I had to put a rubber pad under the press.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: DO NOT BUY IT!!!!!!!!!!!!
customer_reviews.text: If I could give this no stars I would!!!! This is the worst and a waste of money. I have an item stuck in the machine because it wont release. I am so mad!!!! I hope when my husband gets home he is able to make the release break! My customer is going to be angry they are not getting their item on time.
customer_reviews.author: Elizabeth Adams

customer_reviews.title: Great at 1st, but now won’t latch
customer_reviews.text: I have never used a heat press before and this one was easy to use right out of the box. Temperature/time display was easy to figure out and use. If you can set the time on your microwave or car you can figure this one out. The size is great. Pressure was very good until now, 6 months later. Now, the press will not latch at all. I have only pressed t-shirts and sweatshirts and adjusted the knob as needed to decrease pressure for the sweatshirts, as instructed. I have contacted the company and am waiting to see what the can/will do. Will update if they respond.
customer_reviews.author: Keith L. Foreman

customer_reviews.title: Meh
customer_reviews.text: I ordered this item a few years ago and only got to use it about 10 times before I gave up on it. I have gone back to a traditional iron for HTV. It is currently sitting in a hall closet because it is to heavy to deal with.
customer_reviews.author: Diane

customer_reviews.title: This is an amazing value!
customer_reviews.text: I have been making pillows and shirts but didn't want to spend a lot on a press. This works amazingly well. Has a timer and you are able to put a shirt under the base so you don't end up with press lines. It has lasted and every item I have made turned out great!!
customer_reviews.author: JCTexas

customer_reviews.title: Had less then 2 yrs and doesn't lock down!
customer_reviews.text: Didn't even have my press 2 years when all of a sudden it won't lock down. Don't know if this is common, but I tried everything and could not fix it. Kinda sucks that now I have to send another $200 to purchase a new one for my home business. At this rate that is $100 a year for the press if it only lasts 2 yrs.
customer_reviews.author: Katina N Caulder

customer_reviews.title: Love
customer_reviews.text: I had a smaller one for almost 2 years and it went out. Decided to go with this bigger one. I love it!!! It’s easy to use (my last ones timer would beep until I pressed the button to turn it off - annoying). This one beeps until I open the press, which is awesome!! Wish I had a bigger one like this the last 2 years.
customer_reviews.author: Lauren

customer_reviews.title: I love this heat press!
customer_reviews.text: Right out of box to use YOU CAN'T GET EASIER THEN THAT! I love this heat press! Best value for a great price! Easy to use, works fantastic so far! Love, love my heat press!
customer_reviews.author: Danielle Britton

customer_reviews.title: Amazing!!! Love it! Super easy to use!
customer_reviews.text: This little guy is amazing! Super easy to use and has worked perfectly each time.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: The heat press I received was defective. The buttons ...
customer_reviews.text: The heat press I received was defective. The buttons do not work. The press heated to 200 when plugged in and I was unable to change the temperature or timer. I followed the instructions exactly. I returned it.
customer_reviews.author: Thomas & Lori Hassell

customer_reviews.title: Quality Purchase
customer_reviews.text: Great heat press especially for the price. I’ve used it constantly for months now and I’ve have 0 problems. Settings are super easy to change and it’s good quality.
customer_reviews.author: Lai

customer_reviews.title: So far it has worked great! i love being able to personalize my shirts ...
customer_reviews.text: So far it has worked great! i love being able to personalize my shirts and other things. The clicking sound is the only downfall, but not enough to make it a huge deal.
customer_reviews.author: Trinity

customer_reviews.title: Great heat price at a great price!
customer_reviews.text: I LOVE this heat press! Great price for a great machine. It works really well, very happy with the items I have been able to make with it!
customer_reviews.author: Faith

customer_reviews.title: Heat Press
customer_reviews.text: This product has worked for the time I've had it which has been about a month or so. It beats having to iron all of our projects. Works really nice and is easy to you.
customer_reviews.author: Jamie

customer_reviews.title: Overheating lemon!!
customer_reviews.text: The unit keeps overheating... Like 100° too hot and just keeps on rising. It is now scorching and burning all of my transfers and anything that I am pressing. Great, guess I will set this piece of junk out by the curb. Do not buy this if you’re looking for a heat press that is going to last a while
customer_reviews.author: Angie B.

customer_reviews.title: But it works great so far
customer_reviews.text: It's hard to open up when the timer goes off without the whole machine lifting up. But it works great so far. We've only had it a few days and used a couple times.
customer_reviews.author: Chrissie828

customer_reviews.title: Help
customer_reviews.text: So i purchased this product last week, i just received it on Monday. I tried it out yesterday. My question is, is the temperature supposed to drop during the press? During my press of the shirt, the temperature kept dropping. I feel like that shouldnt be happening. I don't know if it was defected or if im doing something wrong. It didn't come with a manual besides how to turn on/off and for safety precautions. Also, should the bottom plate be popping up the way it is?
customer_reviews.author: Hiba K.

customer_reviews.title: Easy to use
customer_reviews.text: I was intimidated to use a heat press and had previously only used an iron to make t-shirts. I love this machine! It is very easy to use. I am glad I made the purchase. It is a sturdy made machine and I made my first large order, 35 shirts, and it was a breeze!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Great for Beginners
customer_reviews.text: I was skeptical at first being a beginner but wanting something that would last . I've had it for a month now and have used about 4 times . I have not had 1 issue with it heating up or doing it's job . Great Beginners Buy
customer_reviews.author: Malik

customer_reviews.title: Business Starter For Sure
customer_reviews.text: This product is great for pressing shirts and hats, it comes all ready put together so no need to put together piece by piece. This heat press heats up quickly and gets the job done, It comes with easy to use instructions so don't worry. this is definitely the heat press you want if your starting a T-Shirt business.
customer_reviews.author: curtis

customer_reviews.title: Heating elements off from gauge and not evenly spread
customer_reviews.text: Well this product does do what it says however the quality of the actual press is OK at best, the heating elements are not even at all, the back side is 15 degrees off from the front and about 10 degrees off from the temperature gauge, however I have pressed shirts and it does do the job. So if you decide to get this be sure to get a laser thermometer also.
customer_reviews.author: julia cimeleybolton

customer_reviews.title: Worth the money!
customer_reviews.text: I bought this March 2017, to start making my own shirts as a I have a vinyl machine. I bought a swing away first and I hated it! There’s no room to see where the design goes on the shirt and the design can move. The clamshell is the way to go and 15x15 is plenty big enough. I’ve not had any problems!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: So far so good
customer_reviews.text: I love that I got a press, so much better than using an iron. Good price, works well so far. The only thing I wish I had was an arm that moves the top plate away but it works great!
customer_reviews.author: Kindle Customer

customer_reviews.title: Does exactly what it should
customer_reviews.text: This press has been great! I've had it for a few months now, using it to cure my screen printed shirts and the shirts are curing beautifully. I have not experienced uneven heating areas and it is evident in my 12x12 designs that have been washed multiple times. Go ahead and pull the trigger on this press. Its worth the money!
customer_reviews.author: Brandon Cobb

customer_reviews.title: Love it
customer_reviews.text: I have had this a few months now and have had no issues. my only gripe would be that the hot plate isn't coated in teflon (my last one was) BUT that's really not a big deal at all.
customer_reviews.author: Kristi

customer_reviews.title: Great
customer_reviews.text: This is a great press! Super straight forward and simple to use. I’m glad I got this instead of a portable iron type because this had great pressure and strength. This is a great investment
customer_reviews.author: Colleen

customer_reviews.title: LOVE IT
customer_reviews.text: I absolutely LOVE this heat press. I was a little intimidated at first, but it's pretty simple to use. I am so glad I went with this one!
customer_reviews.author: Brianna winn

customer_reviews.title: Did Not Last a Year
customer_reviews.text: This heat press didn't even last a year. The first 50 shirts were fine, but then the heating plate was uneven. I thought it was my vinyl that went bad. Turned out, it was the heat press being uneven. Sad.
customer_reviews.author: sengerson

customer_reviews.title: Effective! & Efficient
customer_reviews.text: Love love love my machine .. heats up fast, timer beeps loud and ready...the surface stays so clean and tidy. The lift isn't as hard as I thought was worried cause of the reviews I read but this machine is great for sure... I try to keep minimal things plugged in while using it.. if too many things are on and the heat press is on it does make the lights flicker but when I unplug other plugs, no flickering. Well worth the buy!
customer_reviews.author: Jas I B

customer_reviews.title: Great price and great quality!
customer_reviews.text: This heat press is so easy to use and I was very impressed with the quality! Definitely recommend!
customer_reviews.author: Lauren Holder

customer_reviews.title: It's a nice press..
customer_reviews.text: The press comes with instructions that are written in broken English. It's not super easy to use when you first open it and are trying to figure it out. Once you finally do, it does the job nicely.
customer_reviews.author: T. Williams

customer_reviews.title: So far this machine has been everything I've expected. ...
customer_reviews.text: So far this machine has been everything I've expected. One tip if you have the heating set to high, let it warm up opened up and not closed. I made that mistake and the rubber padding on the bottom was coming up. After it cooled down the padding went back down, but I wish I would've been more careful.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Well worth the money
customer_reviews.text: So far so good. Had this for about a month now. It's doing good. I'll definitely recommend getting one. Best bang for the buck
customer_reviews.author: jonathan daugherty

customer_reviews.title: Life saverrrrrrr
customer_reviews.text: I’ve had this heat press for almost a year and it is perfect! I’m so so happy I made the decision to get it!
customer_reviews.author: E. P.

customer_reviews.title: This is industrial strength
customer_reviews.text: Although this is commercial equipment, I feel that it is too heavy for just anyone to use. It is very hard to open and close. I am impressed with the ease of use otherwise. It is a great press at adhering vinyl to clothing. The 15X15 size is a great size for pressing.
customer_reviews.author: brucebecool

customer_reviews.title: Easy to use
customer_reviews.text: Love that it was easy to set up and use. Great product for the price
customer_reviews.author: Patty

customer_reviews.title: Terrible. When I got the item and plugged it ...
customer_reviews.text: Terrible. When I got the item and plugged it in it took forever to get up to heat. Then finally gets up to heat and I realize they shipped it to me with a bent top which heat wouldn’t be even..
customer_reviews.author: erik ventrella

customer_reviews.title: Instructions could be better but it’s a GREAT product!
customer_reviews.text: It took me a little trial and error before I resorted to some YouTube videos to finally figure out exactly how to work this press. The only complaint I would have is that I wish there were better instructions. Once you get past the learning curve of working the machine it is FANTASTIC! It’s taken my shirt game to a whole new level :)
customer_reviews.author: cmartin

customer_reviews.title: I have been using this press for the last couple of months and absolutely love it. It is very well made and very ...
customer_reviews.text: After LOTS of research, I ended up purchasing this heat press. I'm just starting out and didn't want something outrageously priced. I have been using this press for the last couple of months and absolutely love it. It is very well made and very sturdy. I would suggest either putting felt pads or a towel underneath it while using it since it did scratch up my table, but nothing major. The plate heats evenly and is super easy to use.
customer_reviews.author: Shawn

customer_reviews.title: Stupid Easy to Use!
customer_reviews.text: Can’t attest to the durability yet only because I haven’t had it long enough. But so far it’s awesome. Super easy to set up and use. Works amazing. Really good price as well. Perfect for beginners on up.
customer_reviews.author: Charlee

customer_reviews.title: Temperature is WAY off!
customer_reviews.text: I love the size but the temperature is WAY off! My vinyl wouldn’t stick and would peel easily. I finally turned up the temperature 20 degrees and it worked better. My husband bought a new thermometer reader and tested it, it’s 60 degrees off! No wonder my vinyl wasn’t adhering properly. Sucks that I paid this amount and it’s off. /: the arm kind of sticks too and is hard to open so when I try to open it it shakes my whole table.
customer_reviews.author: Marriah Ortega

customer_reviews.title: Broken after 6 uses
customer_reviews.text: After a month and a half of having this press, I’ve used it a total of 6 times and now the top heating plate is falling off and I have to turn up the heat WAY over the temperature I need to get the vinyl to stick to the shirts, i don’t know how to contact the seller but I’ll be looking into contacting them tomorrow.
customer_reviews.author: Nightowl86

customer_reviews.title: I have had zero problems - this is an easy to use machine
customer_reviews.text: I recently started my own business - and I use this for sweatshirts, tshirts ,tri-blend sublimation and vinyl. I have had zero problems - this is an easy to use machine. A bit heavy, but all my designs are turning out perfectly.
customer_reviews.author: Stephanie

customer_reviews.title: so much better than using an iron and very easy to use
customer_reviews.text: plugged in and pressed 5 shirts in no time! so much better than using an iron and very easy to use!
customer_reviews.author: Jamie

customer_reviews.title: Chipping after having a little over a month
customer_reviews.text: I have used this heat press approximately 20 times since I ordered it on July 30th. I noticed tonight that there is a chip in the top plate and it looks as it is only going to continue to chip. I went to fill out a return and it expired on 9/9 and it's 9/13. Very disappointing and very unhappy that I can't even request a replacement.
customer_reviews.author: Britt Davis

customer_reviews.title: Great price
customer_reviews.text: Great size and price. Perfect for all big jobs and small. Not included but needed silicone paper and pillows. Although is a great price for the product.
customer_reviews.author: Amarillys Vazquez

customer_reviews.title: I love it. Now all my friends want me to ...
customer_reviews.text: I love it. Now all my friends want me to make shirts for them.
customer_reviews.author: Jeff H

customer_reviews.title: Good find
customer_reviews.text: This heat press works great for beginners once you get more advanced your going to want something more! Hard to lift sometimes and the heat is a little off.
customer_reviews.author: DEBRA SUAREZ

customer_reviews.title: After 3 years of steady use it is still going strong!
customer_reviews.text: I bought this heat press over 3 years ago now and it still works just as good as it did when I first bought it. Durable, easy to use and consistent - I have been very happy with this purchase. I use it for vinyl and sublimation and works great every time for each use. Would absolutely recommend this heat press.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Wasnt handled the most careful
customer_reviews.text: I haven't had a chance to use it yet. It seems like it will worked. But it arrived a lot banged up. So far it just seems cosmetic but its already scratched my kitchen table. Left metal pieces and dust all over. I'll updated my review once I have had a chance to use it.
customer_reviews.author: Jackie Luecht

customer_reviews.title: LOVE IT!!!
customer_reviews.text: I have used this machine daily since I got it. I LOVE IT. Everything has turned out fantastic, and I am so happy I made this purchase.
customer_reviews.author: nathan

customer_reviews.title: Works great so far
customer_reviews.text: I have had this heat press for about a month or 2 and it works great so far! I have recommended it to many people
customer_reviews.author: Madison

customer_reviews.title: LOVE LOVE LOVE
customer_reviews.text: LOVE LOVE LOVE! Easy to use and works perfectly! I love the bigger heat space that this heat press provides!
customer_reviews.author: Sarah Bruno

customer_reviews.title: Yeah, No
customer_reviews.text: Returned. Product was damaged and seemed really cheap. Go to heat press nation and hit the Black Friday deals on their heat presses. I don't regret it.
customer_reviews.author: C Burt

customer_reviews.title: Love it!
customer_reviews.text: I used my heat press for the first time and it was awesome! It was so easy to use with easy instruction book and I am so glad tge teflon sheet came with it.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Great purchase!
customer_reviews.text: Great size for all types of projects and well worth the extra cost for bigger size and drop down plate. I have used it quite a few times and love it!
customer_reviews.author: Kimberly R.

customer_reviews.title: Excellent buy
customer_reviews.text: Best money spent, love this heatpress simple to operate and good quality
customer_reviews.author: Melanie

customer_reviews.title: One Star
customer_reviews.text: Arrived broken, issue with heating. Returned and received another defective machine.
customer_reviews.author: JJorgensen

customer_reviews.title: So far so good
customer_reviews.text: Fast delivery. Over all this heat press is good. The instruction book wasn't very useful. I'm a beginner with using a heat press so it would have been better with more help. But overall it wasn't bad.
customer_reviews.author: gizzard701

customer_reviews.title: Slow to heat
customer_reviews.text: This press takes too long to reach temperature, and doesn't hold temperature well. I ended up finishing my project with a hand iron.
customer_reviews.author: nancy

customer_reviews.title: Good product for price
customer_reviews.text: Great price, and fast shipping. But no instructions for actually using it. It has a small book with info about the machine but nothing about actually using it.
customer_reviews.author: Beth

customer_reviews.title: Easy heat press!
customer_reviews.text: This is my first heat press and loving it so far! Can’t comment how well it will do in the long run. But for a beginner this is a great start!
customer_reviews.author: Brooke

customer_reviews.title: Great heat press
customer_reviews.text: I’ve only had this a few months but it is so easy to use. It works perfectly and came all ready to go.
customer_reviews.author: Susan F.

customer_reviews.title: Just buy it!
customer_reviews.text: I was so worried about spending such a large amount on a brand I wasn’t sure of. I am beyond happy I made this purchase and it’s helped me speed up so much! Press works perfect and heats up quickly.
customer_reviews.author: Michelle Gentry

customer_reviews.title: User friendly.
customer_reviews.text: This is a very user friendly heatpress. The temperature and time is set easily with the click of a button. The pressure is easily adjusted and it comes with the teflon sheet so that is awesome. I haven't had any issues using it. The items I have made are evenly pressed without a problem.
customer_reviews.author: Kindle Customer

customer_reviews.title: Went out
customer_reviews.text: I bought this heat press exactly 4months ago and I think it went out on me. When I turn it on it is constantly beeping loud which LLL showing as the error. Not sure what to do but I did email the seller . I did purchase the 4yr warranty so I hope this can be resolved

product_meta.title: Fancierstudio DG Heat Press Digital Sublimation T-Shirt Heat Press,15-by-15-Inch - Black
feature_bullets: Fancierstudio DG Heat Press 15 inch by 15 inch heat press. Voltage: 110V (standard US and Canada) .Power: 1200 watts, Heat Press Style: Clamp shell, Temperature Range: 0 500 degrees F; Time Range:0 to 999 seconds, Electronic time and heat control; precise time set up, Silicon gel base board, Pressure adjustable. Teflon sheet included. Silicon pad lightly glued down not fully for purpose of replacement. Color of heat press is Black Model: DG15X15 B

To start off a successful t shirt business, a heat transfer press is a very important piece of equipment. A t shirt press machine being an integral component makes it important to select the best t shirt heat press in the market.

This Fancierstudio DG heat press works great in both commercial and domestic settings, and it can perform any size job with supreme durability. The easy to use design allows for sturdy operations. When pressed down, it provides industrial strength, pressure, and even temperature, guaranteeing the transfer to last on the garment.

This Fancierstudio DG Heat Press is easy to operate and provides professional results. If you're making shirts for your family or for your clients, the Fancierstudio Heat Press will make a lasting impression

The Fancierstudio DG heat press uses high temperatures and heavy pressure to embed the design onto the material permanently. For professionals especially, these machines are highly recommended instead of using irons. Irons cannot reach the high temperatures and pressure that a heat press machine can reach and sustain. Heat press machines typically require 350 to 400 degrees Fahrenheit.
